CustomField.formula: IF( Has_Virtual_Teaching_Content__c = true, "For parents in and around " + Main_Venue__r.Town__c + ", " + Main_Venue__r.Postcode_District__c + ".", IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Main_Venue__c)), IF( NOT( ISBLANK(Main_Venue__r.Host__c) ), "Course Leader's Home", Main_Venue__r.Name ), "" ) )
CustomField.label: Main Venue Name
